name: Seismic Planet
description:
** It is recommended to play Seismic Planet through the downloadable Windows version. Game may run poorly on some machines playing in browser. **

Made for the Two Button Game Jam, Seismic Planet is inspired by the theme Crumble. Make your way around the globe causing earthquakes and leave a path of toppled buildings behind you.

OBJECTIVE - Crumble as many buildings as you can within 60 seconds to see if you can beat your high score!

Assets from

---

Buildings - Modular Buildings by Kenney 

Music - Club (rewind) by James Hammond
